TEXT.TITLE: ANGLO AMERICAN <AIVJ.J> YEAR TO DEC 31
TEXT.BODY: Shr 516 cts vs 347 Final div 135 vs 125 making 190 vs 180 Pre-tax 133 mln rand vs 137 mln Net 260 mln vs 172 mln Tax 76 mln vs 42 mln Att to outside shareholders 96 mln vs 53 mln Pref div 1 mln vs same Turnover 3.14 billion vs 2.56 billion Div pay May 8, register March 27. Note - Full name is Anglo American Industrial Corp Ltd. Reuter
